casebody.data:
UNITED STATES ex rel. Frank MARCIGLIANO, alias John Rambo or Ranbo, Relator-Appellant, v. Benjamin M. DAY, Commissioner of Immigration, Port of New York, Respondent-Respondent. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. November 18, 1929. No. 54. Maximilian Bader, of New York City, for appellant. Charles H. Tuttle, U. S. Atty., of New York City .(Leon E. Spencer, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for respondent.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
